General.Name: CD Deutsche Eigenheim AG
General.Description: CD Deutsche Eigenheim AG engages in the development and construction of residential projects in Germany. It offers ready to occupy homes for rent or purchase primarily in Berlin, Hamburg, Cologne, Dusseldorf, Frankfurt, Munich, and other cities. The company was formerly known as DESIGN Bau AG and changed its name to CD Deutsche Eigenheim AG in 2013. CD Deutsche Eigenheim AG was founded in 1988 and is based in Berlin, Germany.
